name: chairPosition_setValue
description: This function is used to adjust the position of a massage chair.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the massage chair is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the massage chair is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to adjust the chair position.

parameters.name: predefinedChairPosition
parameters.description: The predefined position to set for the massage chair.
